No concomitant psychotropic medication allow except prn lorazepam first two week management affective anxiety symptom , prn zolpidem zaleplon throughout study management insomnia . Throughout study , psychiatric scale use assess psychiatric symptom presence treatment-emergent adverse event monitor record .
